name: Cupid's Adventure
description:
Brackey's Game Jam .  Test Build . 

This is a endless run; as a section ends a new open begins.  It is a platformer in that you can go left but only in the current section.

uses keyboard: space for jump and arrow keys for directions

Funny story: 

I finished judging for Gdevelop's Game Jam  just as Brackey's Game Jam started.  So as one ends another begins.

I did choice to reuse some of the art and music  as I am trying to find the right game for my Cupid
